mapper.select: SELECT MESSAGE_NO, MESSAGE_SENID, MESSAGE_REID, MESSAGE_TITLE, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_DATE, MESSAGE_SENDEL, MESSAGE_REDEL FROM MESSAGE WHERE MESSAGE_SENID = #{message_senid} AND MESSAGE_SENDEL = 'R' ORDER BY MESSAGE_NO ASC
